title: Peter Green
description: A medical consultation where a doctor examines a patient with chest pain symptoms and diagnoses angina

conversation.teacherApp: Say "Ready to practice" to begin your medical English session!
conversation.expectedResponse: Ready to practice

conversation.teacherApp: You welcome patient warmly: Заходьте, містере Грін.
conversation.expectedResponse: Come in, Mr Green.

conversation.teacherApp: You offer seat: Проходьте і сідайте сюди.
conversation.expectedResponse: Come and sit down here.

conversation.teacherApp: You mention: Я отримав листа від вашого лікаря.
conversation.expectedResponse: I have had a letter from your doctor.

conversation.teacherApp: You describe patient's complaint: Вона каже, що у вас болі.
conversation.expectedResponse: She tells me that you have been having pain.

conversation.teacherApp: You specify location: Біль у грудях.
conversation.expectedResponse: Pain in your chest.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient adds: Так, і в руці.
conversation.expectedResponse: Yes, and in my arm.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes: А також поколювання в пальцях.
conversation.expectedResponse: And also tingling in my fingers.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about an onset: Коли ви вперше помітили цей біль?
conversation.expectedResponse: When did you first notice this pain?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient estimates: Ну, думаю, близько шести місяців тому.
conversation.expectedResponse: Well, I suppose about six months ago.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about first episode: Ви можете згадати, коли це вперше почалося?
conversation.expectedResponse: Can you remember when it first came on?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient recalls incident: Так, я пам'ятаю сильний біль у грудях.
conversation.expectedResponse: Yes, I remember I got a bad pain in my chest.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes activity: Коли я робив покупки.
conversation.expectedResponse: When I was shopping.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient explains severity: Був такий сильний, що не міг дихати.
conversation.expectedResponse: It was so bad that I could not breathe.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about location: У якій частині грудей ви відчували біль?
conversation.expectedResponse: In which part of your chest did you feel the pain?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes area: Прямо по всій грудній клітці.
conversation.expectedResponse: Right across my chest.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about duration: Як довго це тривало?
conversation.expectedResponse: How long did it last?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient gives timeframe: Близько десяти хвилин.
conversation.expectedResponse: About ten minutes.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about response: Що ви робили, коли це сталося?
conversation.expectedResponse: What did you do when it happened?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient describes action: Я просто зупинився і чекав поки пройде.
conversation.expectedResponse: I just stop and wait for it to go away.

conversation.teacherApp: You ask about recurrence: Чи був у вас цей біль знову?
conversation.expectedResponse: Have you had this pain again?

conversation.teacherApp: Patient confirms: Так, я часто відчуваю його коли перенапружуюся.
conversation.expectedResponse: Yes, I often get it when I overdo things.

conversation.teacherApp: You suggest examination: Думаю, на цьому етапі я хотів би вас обстежити.
conversation.expectedResponse: I think at this stage I would like to examine you.

conversation.teacherApp: You give instruction: Роздягніться до пояса.
conversation.expectedResponse: Strip to your waist.

conversation.teacherApp: You check pulse: Спочатку перевірю ваш пульс.
conversation.expectedResponse: First, I will check your pulse.

conversation.teacherApp: You report findings: Це цілком нормально, сімдесят на хвилину.
conversation.expectedResponse: It is quite normal, seventy per minute.

conversation.teacherApp: You check blood pressure: Тепер ваш кров'яний тиск.
conversation.expectedResponse: Now your blood pressure.

conversation.teacherApp: You reassure patient: Теж цілком нормальний, сто тридцять на вісімдесят.
conversation.expectedResponse: That is quite normal too, one hundred thirty over eighty.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient expresses relief: Я радий це чути.
conversation.expectedResponse: I am pleased to hear it.

conversation.teacherApp: You examine heart: Зараз я послухаю ваше серце.
conversation.expectedResponse: Now I am going to listen to your heart.

conversation.teacherApp: You give breathing instruction: Дихайте нормально.
conversation.expectedResponse: Breathe normally.

conversation.teacherApp: You reassure about heart: Ваше серце звучить цілком нормально.
conversation.expectedResponse: Your heart sounds quite normal.

conversation.teacherApp: Patient says: Це полегшення.
conversation.expectedResponse: That is a relief.

conversation.teacherApp: You check lungs: Робіть глибокі вдихи і видихи.
conversation.expectedResponse: Take deep breaths in and out.

conversation.teacherApp: You continue lung examination: Поки я перевіряю ваші легені.
conversation.expectedResponse: While I check your lungs.

conversation.teacherApp: You report lung findings: Вони повністю чисті.
conversation.expectedResponse: They are completely clear.

conversation.teacherApp: You provide diagnosis: Біль схожий на стенокардію.
conversation.expectedResponse: The pain sounds very much like angina.

conversation.teacherApp: You explain condition: Це відбувається, коли до серця надходить недостатньо кисню.
conversation.expectedResponse: This occurs when not enough oxygen is getting to the heart.

conversation.teacherApp: You suggest tests: Я хочу призначити кілька тестів.
conversation.expectedResponse: I want to order some tests.

conversation.teacherApp: You promise treatment plan: Після цього зможу порадити лікування.
conversation.expectedResponse: After that, I will be able to recommend treatment.
conversation.grammarNote: Future Simple with modal - Future capability

conversation.teacherApp: Well done, that is all for today's lesson, say "finish" to end the lesson.
conversation.expectedResponse: finish
